DocAttribute.Name: NominalDiameter
DocAttribute.Documentation: The nominal diameter describing the cross-section size of the fastener type. > Deprecated in IFC4

DocAttribute.Name: NominalLength
DocAttribute.Documentation: The nominal length describing the longitudinal dimensions of the fastener type. > Deprecated in IFC4

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectPredefinedType
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either the _PredefinedType_ attribute is unset (e.g. because an _IfcMechanicalFastenerType_ is associated), or the inherited attribute _ObjectType_ shall be provided, if the _PredefinedType_ is set to USERDEFINED.

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectTypeAssigned
DocWhereRule.Documentation: If this occurrence is defined by a type object, the latter has to be an _IfcMechanicalFastenerType_.
